title: Ep. - 445 - DIRECTOR AND PRODUCER OF TINDER SWINDLER
description:
Director Felicity Morris, producer Bernie Higgins, and VG reporter Erlend Ofte Arntsen

discuss the Netflix documentary Tinder Swindler, about how a conman named Simon Leviev used a dating app to meet, seduce and fleece women.

 

 

Reality Life with Kate Casey

Patreon: http://www.patreon.com/katecasey
